diagram.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a simple drawing or plan that shows exactly where something is, what something looks like, or how something works
diagram.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a diagram of the heating system
diagram.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to show or represent something in a diagram
diagram.translation[2].definitions[0].de: a drawing or plan that shows where something is, what it looks like, or how it works
diagram.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: See the attached diagram for details on current market projections.
a diagram of the electrical system
